availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel Arms, Jr. (Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of William Arms, Sr. and Barbara Bear Arms. Married to Eliza Arms. Father of Virginia Arms, Joseph H. Arms, Nancy Arms, and William A. Arms. Farmer in Breckinridge County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District No. 2, p. 63A. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District No. 2, p. 64. W. H. Perrin, J. H. Battle, and G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State (Louisville: F. A. Battey and Company, 1887), 1097.
